text: Non-duality is the recognition that there is no separation.
No separation between you and the world.
No separation between you and other people.
No separation between you and the infinite.
This is not a philosophical concept.
When you see that everything is one.
That there's no real boundary anywhere.
This is the truth of non-duality.
In this knowing, all questions dissolve.
Because you realize there was never a problem.
There was only the illusion of separation.
This is the end of suffering.
This is the beginning of true freedom.
